body_html:
@sebesbal try to create a .lib file from .dll,
references: https://adrianhenke.wordpress.com/2008/12/05/create-lib-file-from-dll/
you will need to use lib /MACHINE:X86 or X64 params for different platform.
eg. lib /MACHINE:X86 /def:C:\mypath\mylib.def /OUT:C:\mypath\mylib.lib
body_text:
@sebesbal try to create a .lib file from .dll,
references: https://adrianhenke.wordpress.com/2008/12/05/create-lib-file-from-dll/
you will need to use lib  /MACHINE:X86 or X64 params for different platform.
eg. lib /MACHINE:X86  /def:C:\mypath\mylib.def /OUT:C:\mypath\mylib.lib
body:
@sebesbal try to create a .lib file from .dll, 
references: https://adrianhenke.wordpress.com/2008/12/05/create-lib-file-from-dll/
you will need to use lib  /MACHINE:X86 or X64 params for different platform.
eg. lib /MACHINE:X86  /def:C:\mypath\mylib.def /OUT:C:\mypath\mylib.lib
